price: 32. Bevelen hun verstand hen dit (afdwaling) of treedt hun volk buiten de grenzen.
arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: am tamuruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā am hum qawmun ṭāghūna
